attribute.attributeDefinition: The unique code for each baseline program project funded through the SC MPA Baseline Program. This code refers to a specific entry on the SC_MPA_BaselineProgramInformation_LookupTable.
Unique site code that indicates where the Long-Term Monitoring survey was done. this site code refers to a specific entry on the sc_mpa_intertidal_site_table.
The specific organism that this plot was created to monitor.

textDomain.definition: Name of the organism as identified on the Integrated Taxonomic Information System (ITIS, http://www.itis.usda.gov). In cases where substrate or other non taxonomic name is used, classification determined by the survey team.

attribute.attributeDefinition: The area of the plot in square meters (m2).

The year this plot configuration was established. This year is expressed in YYYY format. Dates reflect measurements taken in local time. Local time is Pacific Standard Time except during months when Pacific Daylight Time is effective.

The month this plot configuration was established. This month is expressed in M or MM format. Dates reflect measurements taken in local time. Local time is Pacific Standard Time except during months when Pacific Daylight Time is effective.

The day of the month this plot configuration was established. This date is expressed in D or DD format. Dates reflect measurements taken in local time. Local time is Pacific Standard Time except during months when Pacific Daylight Time is effective.
